name: SinkMyShip™
0:
”Alexa, open Sink My Ship”
”Alexa, start Sink My Ship”
”Alexa, launch Sink My Ship”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sink my ship
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sink My Ship™ is an interactive strategy game similar to the classic games Battleship or Naval Battle. Players take turns trying to find 5 hidden ships (see ships below). You can play on a 10 x 10 board, where rows use alphabetic letters (A to J) and columns number from 1 to 10. For example, a player can guess, “F 6” and receive a “hit” or “miss” response. The game is over when all of one player’s ships have been found. 

There are 5 ships as follows:
- Destroyer (2 spaces)
- Cruiser (3 spaces)
- Submarine (3 spaces)
- Battleship (4 spaces)
- Carrier (5 spaces)

Players can play individually or collaboratively in a group!

About SayKid™
SayKid™ combines voice technology with tangible play to help kids learn in an actively-engaging and joyful way - without screens! SayKid™ recently won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge! 

For more screen-free learning experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. If you enjoyed this experience, we’d really appreciate a review!
priv:
